participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

ehi1b.Description: Writing | 100 = Always Right; 50 = Usually Right; 0 = Both Equally; -50 = Usually Left; -100 = Always Left

ehi2b.Description: Throwing | 100 = Always Right; 50 = Usually Right; 0 = Both Equally; -50 = Usually Left; -100 = Always Left

ehi3b.Description: Toothbrush | 100 = Always Right; 50 = Usually Right; 0 = Both Equally; -50 = Usually Left; -100 = Always Left

ehi4b.Description: Spoon | 100 = Always Right; 50 = Usually Right; 0 = Both Equally; -50 = Usually Left; -100 = Always Left

ehi_y_ss_scoreb.Description: Handedness score rating | 1=right handed; 2=left handed; 3=mixed handed//Calculation: if ((mean([ehi1b], [ehi2b], [ehi3b],[ehi4b]) < -60),2, if ((mean([ehi1b], [ehi2b], [ehi3b],[ehi4b]) > 60),1,3)); 1.  Veale, J. F. (2014) Edinburgh Handedness Inventory - Short Form: a revised version based on confirmatory factor analysis. Laterality 19(2):164-77.  //If mixed handed, use the hand that the child writes with for NeuroCog and fMRI tasks.
